name: unmanned
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to refer to a spacecraft, or a place where military guards work, that has no people present to operate or be in charge of it: an unmanned mission to the planet Mars

not having or not needing people to operate or work correctly: Both designs represent a new generation of unmanned aircraft, which began in the 1990s with robotic spy planes.
